channel.title: Stuff.co.nz - Stuff
channel.description: Top Stories from Stuff.co.nz. New Zealand, world, sport, business & entertainment news on Stuff.co.nz.

item.title: Security tightened around White Ferns in England after 'not-credible' threat
item.description: Investigators concluded the threat was not 'credible', but security has been stepped up as a precaution.
item.dc:creator: STUFF SPORTS REPORTERS

item.title: Which kitchen and bathroom are your favourites? NKBA voting is open
item.description: It's your chance to have a say - voting is open for the NKBA People's Choice Award. Who will take top honours this time?
item.dc:creator: COLLEEN HAWKES

item.title: Covid-19 NZ: Apprentice winner Vanessa Goodson tested positive after daughter became ill
item.description: Goodson has been documenting her stay in MIQ on Instagram, where she has been cooking up a storm on her air fryer.
item.dc:creator: KIRSTY LAWRENCE

item.title: Homeowner's curse now a blessing, says crowdfunding recipient
item.description: Wendy Popplewell's home was becoming burdensome with its need for repairs but a crowdfunding effort has given it a new lease on life.
item.dc:creator: SINEAD GILL

item.title: Covid-19: Locations of interest in Delta outbreak, September 21
item.description: The most recent addition to the list shows there was a potential exposure event at a supermarket on Sunday.
item.dc:creator: MINA KERR-LAZENBY

item.title: Springboks deflect former All Blacks coach Laurie Mains' stinging criticism
item.description: World champions defend their selections and methods as heat turns up ahead of their 100th test against the All Blacks.
item.dc:creator: STUFF SPORTS WRITERS

item.title: Covid-19 live: We know how prisoner got Covid, says PM
item.description: Officials are looking at the transport of a prisoner on bail into an area of Waikato now moved to a 'bespoke' level 4 to see what, if any, rules have been broken, Jacinda Ardern says.
item.dc:creator: Stuff

item.title: Ted Lasso: I was a cynic, but I've fallen in love with Apple's football comedy
item.description: REVIEW: Jason Sudeikis' character's warmth and optimism is infectious, while the show is a celebration of the beautiful game and the English language.
item.dc:creator: JAMES CROOT

item.title: Iwi signs up with South Taranaki council for better relationship
item.description: An iwi and council in South Taranaki have set out a mix of Māori and Pākehā values to guide their future relationship.
item.dc:creator: CRAIG ASHWORTH/LOCAL DEMOCRACY REPORTING

item.title: One of the 'lucky' ones: Napier man secures one of 3000 MIQ spots
item.description: First Desmond Gosling had a spot for his wife, then he didn't ... then he did again.
item.dc:creator: MARTY SHARPE

item.title: Wellington today, September 21: Fears Hutt maternity crisis worse; hospo, arts breathe 'sigh of relief' at rule change
item.description: All you need to know about what's happening in the capital today.
item.dc:creator: BILL HICKMAN WELLINGTON REPORTERS

item.title: The Ice Road: Liam Neeson sinks to a new low with this preposterous thriller
item.description: REVIEW: Even the Northern Irishman's very particular set of skills can't save this soggy mess of contrivances and action movie cliches.
item.dc:creator: JAMES CROOT

item.title: Everybody's Talking About Jamie: Amazon's uplifting teen musical never drags
item.description: REVIEW: Boasting a pair of fabulous young leads, terrific choreography and costuming, memorable tunes and Richard E. Grant, entertainment is a given.
item.dc:creator: JAMES CROOT

item.title: When will an EV cost the same as a petrol car?
item.description: EVs currently cost more than equivalent ICE models, but that isn't actually far off from changing.
item.dc:creator: DAMIEN O'CARROLL

item.title: Lexus' first EV is arriving soon for less than $80k
item.description: Lexus has confirmed its first fully electric vehicle will come in below the $80k Clean Car Discount threshold.
item.dc:creator: NILE BIJOUX

item.title: IPL: Lockie Ferguson on target as Kolkata Knight Riders spoil Virat Kohli’s big day for Royal Challengers Bangalore
item.description: Black Caps quick stars in dominant display to ensure Kohli’s 200th appearance for Bangalore was not one to remember.
item.dc:creator: STUFF SPORTS REPORTERS

item.title: 10 bungalows set to make way for 18 homes in Westown, New Plymouth
item.description: Kāinga Ora, the Government's housing arm, is behind the plans for two sites.
item.dc:creator: ANDREW OWEN

item.title: Hyundai ropes in Spot to guard one of its factories
item.description: Hyundai has called in the dogs to guard its factories - not the regular sort, though.
item.dc:creator: NILE BIJOUX

item.title: Covid 19: If Auckland isn't in level 2 in two weeks, elimination will have all but failed
item.description: ANALYSIS: The Government has made the right political call. Now we wait to see if the reality of Delta matches the theory of elimination.
item.dc:creator: LUKE MALPASS

item.title: New Plymouth District Council to consider feedback over Government's Three Waters reforms
item.description: The proposed shake-up of the way the country's water services are managed has some strong aspects, New Plymouth district councillors will be told today, but there are also areas of concern.
item.dc:creator: BRIANNA MCILRAITH
